title: Referral Request for [Job Title] at [Company Name]
subject: Referral Request: [Job Title] Role at [Company Name]
body:
Hi [Name],

I hope you're doing well! I’m reaching out because I noticed the [Job Title] position at [Company Name] and it seems like a perfect match for my background in [mention specific skills/experience]. I’m very interested in this role and would appreciate any guidance or referral you could provide.

title: Referral Request After Networking Event

body:
